author: Darren Hynes
comment: I just recently moved from Apple to Samsung and I have to say hands down the iPhone version of this app is far superior, hopefully they get the bugs worked out soon as I really enjoyed the iPhone version.  Update... I cannot get this app to work at all. It says to hold near the reader and does a countdown of 10 seconds but the debit machines just double beep and tell me its not supported. Happily I have 15 days to return this S8+ , I've tapping my iPhone for years with never a problem :/

author: Mathieu Aube
comment: It's my bank and therefore use the app regularly, but it needs tweaking. Most banks have fingerprint authentication (a must today) The login has a glitch where if you input the password wrong, putting the right password won't work and you have to reset the app. Needs work, especially considering this is a big bank.

author: Justin Wake
comment: -The app told me to refresh a card in my mobile wallet but I am unable to remove it. -The login screen always refreshes a few seconds after opening and it messes up the password I'm trying to input. -Fingerprint login as an option would be great.

author: Don Edwards
comment: Crashes continuously. Can't do anything without it going down. Cannot get out of services screen. You can take check pictures forever and it keeps asking to repeat. I have yet to get anything to work on this app.

author: Natalie Davis
comment: Mobile wallet worked once. Never again. I set up all my cards in the wallet and verified them etc. One card worked one time. The feature has never worked again. When I click the card it just begins the countdown and says to tap it. Nothing happens. The machines are never able to read it.

author: David Khuu
comment: UI is outdated. It's a little slow performance-wise. Functionally, I guess it works. Just enough to get by but it is definitely lacking compared to using web login.

This app is not user-friendly compared to other banking apps I've used. The interface is poorly designed. It feels like the app is 10 years old. Also other banking apps have fingerprint login and this one doesn't. Needs a lot of work.

author: A Clapp
comment: Since last update, everytime I open the app, it just opens up to a black screen. Can't do anything with the app right now.

author: Alvin C
comment: Really outdated. Iphone version is way better. No fingerprint login, doesn't fit phone aspect ratio, and often glitches.

author: Katherine Gainer
comment: Quite possibly the SLOWEST app I have ever used, its good for checking balances and that's about it.  Gets worse after each update as well, so frustrating!!!!

author: Smit Patel
comment: No biometric log in in 2018? Shame on you guys. Hire me as a developer, i will add it for with no cost.
A useful update for the app would be for the app and Scotia system to recognize the date and amount of payments to reflect remaining payment balance(s) and not just the date count down.

author: Mustafa Vakil
comment: You should add the fingerprint to sign-in option cause everytime I need to sign-in I have to enter the password which is tiring

author: colin carleton
comment: Can't do a damn thing since last update! Fix your damn mess I have bills to pay while I'm out of Province!

author: Matthew Fox
comment: They really need to update the user interface and make the app run better otherwise I love Scotiabank just their app sucks

author: Mooshe
comment: Only seems to function 60% of the time. Far too often have I been caught trying to pay for something (right after transferring money to my account) and not having it work because the app was unavailable.

author: Andrew T
comment: App is really outdated.   1.  It's missing fingerprint sign-in  2. Doesn't support Android Wear 2.0 3.  UI looks ugly and doesn't fit 18:9 aspect ratio on newer phones

author: Ricardo Labeach
comment: I switch from IPhone. Back to android I a honestly miss having the finger print acess. The app needs to be freshened up appease improve your

author: Dylan Rainford
comment: Works fine for checking balances, paying bills and transferring money but is incredibly laggy when loading. It's always needing to refresh the current screen I'm on to make it load.

author: Azoriandan
comment: Camera deposit doesn't work anymore   even after reinstall.

author: Lee Bodsworth
comment: I have problems with my loyalty cards i have to keep logging into my cards everytime i sign into my account very cumbersome

author: BustyChicksFTW
comment: Garbage app. Can't even login on my account unless I'm on wifi for some reason.

author: Chris Carpenter
comment: Use to like it.  Now I can't even get on the app.  Will need to delete.  It's useless

author: Natalie Wong
comment: Overdrawn accounts should remain in red. OVERPAID credit cards or lines of credit should appear in GREEN

author: Dave Irwin
comment: I opened a bank account with Scotia for the first time today made a deposit of $600 in cash and they put a hold on it and I have to wait a couple of days to go to the branch to be open so they can release it great first experience. Yes that was total sarcasm

author: Davem 1969
comment: I've never encountered an app with do many issues!! Fix the gdamn thing!!!!

author: Chris MacDonald
comment: Having an issue with mobile wallet emailed the developer email address at rhe  bottom of the page. They replied with a number to call for support.....called it amd keep getting passed/jerked around........Terrible Support System!!!!!!

author: Jaidee King
comment: Update your darn UI you lazy SOBs

author: Chris Ramsay
comment: Deleted my card out of mobile wallet. Now I can't get my card back into mobile wallet.

author: Fawn Dawn
comment: Slow to load and login. Often goes down.
Pixel 2 XL running public android 8.1. Why isn't there an option to use the fingerprint scanner for security?

author: Travis Cappon
comment: ... Am I the only one that cannot use the mobile wallet?  NFC is on and data and I can't get it working at all!

author: Maeg
comment: Please fix the auto capture feature for the mobile deposit, or at least give the option to use manual capture.

author: Robert Booker
comment: Sluggish and slow ui is archaic

author: Kevin Patenaude
comment: I've always appreciated being apart of Scotia for the last 15 years.

author: Abidemi Koleoso
comment: Enable touch id for androids.

author: John Markle
comment: Buggy and brutally unreliable
E-statements now work with this version :-)

author: mridul verma
comment: Need to update it

author: Kelvin Rumish
comment: Rubbish app
